Rulings.Edison:
●This effect targets the Spell Card in your GY.
●When you Synchro Summon a Spellcaster-Type monster with “Urgent Tuning” that was activated as Chain Link 2 or higher using “Magicat” as a Synchro Material Monster, you can activate the effect to return a Spell Card in a new Chain after the first one resolves.
●If “DNA Surgery” is changing monsters into Spellcasters and you use this card for a Synchro Summon, you can activate its effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. This effect targets the Spell Card in your GY.\n2. When you Synchro Summon a Spellcaster-Type monster with "Urgent Tuning" that was activated as Chain Link 2 or higher using "Magicat" as a Synchro Material Monster, you can activate the effect to return a Spell Card in a new Chain after the first one resolves.\n3. If "DNA Surgery" is changing monsters into Spellcasters and you use this card for a Synchro Summon, you can activate its effect.

PSCT.Edison: ① If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material for a Spellcaster: You can target 1 Spell in your GY; return that target to the top of the Deck.
